com.b2international.commons.ldap

Class LdapHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.commons.ldap.LdapHelper

  • public abstract class LdapHelper
extends Object
    Collection of static helper methods, helping to set up LDAP operations.

    • Method Summary

      • hasAttribute

        public static boolean hasAttribute(Attributes attributes,
                                   String attributeId)
        Checks whether the specified attribute set has an attribute with the given identifier and a single associated value.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the attribute set to test (may not be null)
        attributeId - the attribute identifier to look for (may not be null)
        Returns:
        true if the attribute set contains exactly one value for the attribute, false otherwise (the attribute is not present or holds multiple values)

      • closeLdapContext

      • createSearchControls

        public static SearchControls createSearchControls(int limit,
                                                  String... returningAttributes)
        Creates a new SearchControls instance with the specified limit and attributes to return.
        Parameters:
        limit - the maximum number of search results to return (0 for no limit)
        returningAttributes - the attributes to return with each search result
        Returns:
        the configured SearchControls instance
